column4: hi there! my laptop wants to configure all network devices on startup. the dhcp-request takes quite a lot of time and i'd like to stop the system from auto-bring-up the interfaces to save time at startup. any ideas?
thats what i thought aswell. but there is only "auto lo" the others are not set to auto
I suspect the gnome network manager - if you don't start the applet - the interfaces file may cooperate
